resources.string: Please verify that at least one fingerprint has been registered on the devices.
Fingerprint scanner is absent od disable on this device.
Please verify that the lock screen is protected by a PIN, pattern or password (fingerprints can only works if the lock screen has been secured).
To many attempts. Please try again later.

If You wish to use Fingerprint Authentication,please verify:
 1. that the lock screen is protected by a PIN, pattern or password (fingerprints can only works if the lock screen has been secured).
 2. that at least one fingerprint has been registered on the device.

 Wish to open Secure Settings to verify?
